trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberCompleted"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous operation can be canceled by calling <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Az aszinkron művelet lehet megszakítani <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator.CancelAsync%2A> meghívásával

trans-unit.source: The page number where the `contentPosition` appears.
trans-unit.target: Az oldalszám ahol a `contentPosition` jelenik meg.

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred during the asynchronous operation; or NULL if there were no errors.
trans-unit.target: A az aszinkron művelet; közben történt kivétel vagy NULL, ha nincsenek hibák léptek fel.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the asynchronous operation was canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha az aszinkron művelet meg lett szakítva; Ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.GetPageNumberCompletedEventArgs.PageNumber%2A> property identifies the page number of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition>.
Gets the page number for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: Az oldal száma lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> átadott

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition> property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition> passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync%2A>.
The page number (zero-based) for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"></xref> passed to <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: A lap (nulla) a száma a <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ContentPosition"> </xref> <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator.GetPageNumberAsync*> átadott
